name: AMAROK-MD
description: Amarok is an WhatsApp user bot made  by toxic cyber.

SUDO.description: Must enter your number if you are using in PRIVATE mode; Your number must be in international format. So you should have your number after the country code. Example: 91xxxxxxxxx,33xxxxxxxx

BLOCK_CHAT.description: Enter number for blocking personal chat

NO_ONLINE.description: Type true if you don't want to appear online.

SEND_READ.description: If entered true , bot will mark messages as read

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Enter heroku app name same as you given on the first
